fields.name: cart
fields.description: Returns information about shopping cart

fields.name: categoryList
fields.description: Returns an array of categories based on the specified filters.

fields.name: checkoutAgreements
fields.description: The Checkout Agreements information

fields.name: cmsBlocks
fields.description: The CMS block query returns information about CMS blocks

fields.name: cmsPage
fields.description: The CMS page query returns information about a CMS page

fields.name: countries
fields.description: The countries query provides information for all countries.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The countries query provides information for a single country.

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency query returns information about store currency.

fields.name: customAttributeMetadata
fields.description: The customAttributeMetadata query returns the attribute type, given an attribute code and entity type

fields.name: customer
fields.description: The customer query returns information about a customer account

fields.name: customerCart
fields.description: Returns information about the customer shopping cart

fields.name: customerDownloadableProducts
fields.description: The query returns the contents of a customer's downloadable products

fields.name: customerOrders
fields.description: List of customer orders

fields.name: customerPaymentTokens
fields.description: Return a list of customer payment tokens

fields.name: getHostedProUrl
fields.description: Retrieve secure PayPal url for Payments Pro Hosted Solution transaction.

fields.name: getPayflowLinkToken
fields.description: Retrieve payment credentials for transaction. Use this query for Payflow Link and Payments Advanced payment methods.

fields.name: giftCardAccount
fields.description: Get information for gift card account by code

fields.name: products
fields.description: The products query searches for products that match the criteria specified in the search and filter attributes.

fields.name: storeConfig
fields.description: The store config query

fields.name: urlResolver
fields.description: The urlResolver query returns the relative URL for a specified product, category or CMS page, using as input a url_key appended by the url_suffix, if one exists

fields.name: applied_coupons
fields.description: An array of `AppliedCoupon` objects. Each object contains the `code` text attribute, which specifies the coupon code

fields.name: applied_gift_cards
fields.description: Contains the code attribute, which specifies the applied gift card codes

fields.name: applied_store_credit
fields.description: Contains store credit information applied on the cart

fields.name: available_payment_methods
fields.description: Available payment methods

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID of the cart.

fields.name: applied_balance
fields.description: Applied balance to the current cart

fields.name: code
fields.description: Gift card account code

fields.name: current_balance
fields.description: Current balance remaining on gift card

fields.name: expiration_date
fields.description: Gift card expiration date

fields.name: currency
fields.description: A three-letter currency code, such as USD or EUR

fields.name: value
fields.description: A number expressing a monetary value

fields.name: applied_balance
fields.description: Applied store credit balance to the current cart

fields.name: current_balance
fields.description: Current balance remaining on store credit

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Indicates whether store credits are enabled. If the feature is disabled, then the current balance will not be returned

fields.name: code
fields.description: The payment method code

fields.name: title
fields.description: The payment method title.

fields.name: discounts
fields.description: An array of discounts to be applied to the cart item

fields.name: total_item_discount
fields.description: The total of all discounts applied to the item

fields.name: amount
fields.description: The amount of the discount

fields.name: label
fields.description: A description of the discount

fields.name: attribute_set_id
fields.description: The attribute set assigned to the product.

fields.name: canonical_url
fields.description: Relative canonical URL. This value is returned only if the system setting 'Use Canonical Link Meta Tag For Products' is enabled

fields.name: categories
fields.description: The categories assigned to a product.

fields.name: country_of_manufacture
fields.description: The product's country of origin.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was created.

fields.name: crosssell_products
fields.description: Crosssell Products

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed information about the product. The value can include simple HTML tags.

fields.name: gift_message_available
fields.description: Indicates whether a gift message is available.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID number assigned to the product.

fields.name: image
fields.description: The relative path to the main image on the product page.

fields.name: is_returnable
fields.description: Indicates whether the product can be returned

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.description: A number representing the product's manufacturer.

fields.name: media_gallery
fields.description: An array of Media Gallery objects.

fields.name: meta_description
fields.description: A brief overview of the product for search results listings, maximum 255 characters.

fields.name: meta_keyword
fields.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that are visible only to search engines.

fields.name: meta_title
fields.description: A string that is displayed in the title bar and tab of the browser and in search results lists.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The product name. Customers use this name to identify the product.

fields.name: new_from_date
fields.description: The beginning date for new product listings, and determines if the product is featured as a new product.

fields.name: new_to_date
fields.description: The end date for new product listings.

fields.name: only_x_left_in_stock
fields.description: Product stock only x left count

fields.name: options_container
fields.description: If the product has multiple options, determines where they appear on the product page.

fields.name: price_range
fields.description: A PriceRange object, indicating the range of prices for the product

fields.name: price_tiers
fields.description: An array of TierPrice objects.

fields.name: product_links
fields.description: An array of ProductLinks objects.

fields.name: related_products
fields.description: Related Products

fields.name: short_description
fields.description: A short description of the product. Its use depends on the theme.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: A number or code assigned to a product to identify the product, options, price, and manufacturer.

fields.name: small_image
fields.description: The relative path to the small image, which is used on catalog pages.

fields.name: special_from_date
fields.description: The beginning date that a product has a special price.

fields.name: special_price
fields.description: The discounted price of the product.

fields.name: special_to_date
fields.description: The end date that a product has a special price.

fields.name: stock_status
fields.description: Stock status of the product

fields.name: swatch_image
fields.description: The file name of a swatch image

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: The relative path to the product's thumbnail image.

fields.name: updated_at
fields.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was updated.

fields.name: upsell_products
fields.description: Upsell Products

fields.name: url_key
fields.description: The part of the URL that identifies the product

fields.name: url_rewrites

fields.name: url_suffix
fields.description: The part of the product URL that is appended after the url key

fields.description: 301 or 302 HTTP code for url permanent or temporary redirect or 0 for the 200 no redirect

fields.name: relative_url
fields.description: The internal relative URL. If the specified  url is a redirect, the query returns the redirected URL, not the original.

fields.name: type
fields.description: One of PRODUCT, CATEGORY, or CMS_PAGE.

fields.name: applyGiftCardToCart
fields.description: Apply a pre-defined gift card code to the specified cart.

fields.name: applyStoreCreditToCart
fields.description: Apply store credit to the specified cart.

fields.name: changeCustomerPassword
fields.description: Changes the password for the logged-in customer

fields.name: createBraintreeClientToken
fields.description: Creates Client Token for Braintree Javascript SDK initialization.

fields.name: createCustomer
fields.description: Create customer account

fields.name: createCustomerAddress
fields.description: Create customer address

fields.name: createEmptyCart
fields.description: Creates an empty shopping cart for a guest or logged in user

fields.name: createPayflowProToken
fields.description: Initiates a transaction and receives a token. Use this mutation for Payflow Pro and Payments Pro payment methods

fields.name: createPaypalExpressToken
fields.description: Initiates an Express Checkout transaction and receives a token. Use this mutation for Express Checkout and Payments Standard payment methods.

fields.name: deleteCustomerAddress
fields.description: Delete customer address

fields.name: deletePaymentToken
fields.description: Delete a customer payment token

fields.name: generateCustomerToken
fields.description: Retrieve the customer token

fields.name: handlePayflowProResponse
fields.description: Handles payment response and saves payment in Quote. Use this mutations for Payflow Pro and Payments Pro payment methods.

fields.name: mergeCarts
fields.description: Merges the source cart into the destination cart

fields.name: redeemGiftCardBalanceAsStoreCredit
fields.description: Redeem gift card for store credit.

fields.name: removeStoreCreditFromCart
fields.description: Remove applied store credit from the specified cart.

fields.name: revokeCustomerToken
fields.description: Revoke the customer token

fields.name: sendEmailToFriend
fields.description: Recommends Product by Sending Single/Multiple Email

fields.name: updateCustomer
fields.description: Update the customer's personal information

fields.name: updateCustomerAddress
fields.description: Update customer address

fields.description: The value of the gift card

fields.name: option_id
fields.description: An ID assigned to each type of item in a bundle product.

fields.name: options
fields.description: An array of additional options for this bundle item.

fields.name: position
fields.description: he relative position of this item compared to the other bundle items.

fields.name: required
fields.description: Indicates whether the item must be included in the bundle.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: The SKU of the bundle product.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The display name of the item.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The input type that the customer uses to select the item. Examples include radio button and checkbox.

fields.name: can_change_quantity
fields.description: Indicates whether the customer can change the number of items for this option.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID assigned to the bundled item option.

fields.name: is_default
fields.description: Indicates whether this option is the default option.

fields.name: label
fields.description: The text that identifies the bundled item option.

fields.name: position
fields.description: When a bundle item contains multiple options, the relative position of this option compared to the other options.

fields.name: price
fields.description: The price of the selected option.

fields.name: price_type
fields.description: One of FIXED, PERCENT, or DYNAMIC.

fields.name: product
fields.description: Contains details about this product option.

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Indicates the quantity of this specific bundle item.

fields.name: attribute_set_id
fields.description: The attribute set assigned to the product.

fields.name: canonical_url
fields.description: Relative canonical URL. This value is returned only if the system setting 'Use Canonical Link Meta Tag For Products' is enabled

fields.name: categories
fields.description: The categories assigned to a product.

fields.name: country_of_manufacture
fields.description: The product's country of origin.

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Timestamp indicating when the product was created.

fields.name: crosssell_products
fields.description: Crosssell Products

fields.name: description
fields.description: Detailed information about the product. The value can include simple HTML tags.

fields.name: dynamic_price
fields.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamic price.

fields.name: dynamic_sku
fields.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamic SK.

fields.name: dynamic_weight
fields.description: Indicates whether the bundle product has a dynamically calculated weight.

fields.name: gift_message_available
fields.description: Indicates whether a gift message is available.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The ID number assigned to the product.

fields.name: image
fields.description: The relative path to the main image on the product page.

fields.name: is_returnable
fields.description: Indicates whether the product can be returned

fields.name: items
fields.description: An array containing information about individual bundle items.

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.description: A number representing the product's manufacturer.

fields.name: media_gallery
fields.description: An array of Media Gallery objects.

fields.name: meta_description
fields.description: A brief overview of the product for search results listings, maximum 255 characters.

fields.name: meta_keyword
fields.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that are visible only to search engines.

fields.name: meta_title
fields.description: A string that is displayed in the title bar and tab of the browser and in search results lists.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The product name. Customers use this name to identify the product.

fields.name: new_from_date
fields.description: The beginning date for new product listings, and determines if the product is featured as a new product.

fields.name: new_to_date
fields.description: The end date for new product listings.

fields.name: only_x_left_in_stock
fields.description: Product stock only x left count

fields.name: options
fields.description: An array of options for a customizable product.

fields.name: options_container
fields.description: If the product has multiple options, determines where they appear on the product page.

fields.name: price_range
fields.description: A PriceRange object, indicating the range of prices for the product

fields.name: price_tiers
fields.description: An array of TierPrice objects.

fields.name: price_view
fields.description: One of PRICE_RANGE or AS_LOW_AS.

fields.name: product_links
fields.description: An array of ProductLinks objects.

fields.name: related_products
fields.description: Related Products

fields.name: ship_bundle_items
fields.description: Indicates whether to ship bundle items together or individually.

fields.name: short_description
fields.description: A short description of the product. Its use depends on the theme.

fields.name: sku
fields.description: A number or code assigned to a product to identify the product, options, price, and manufacturer.

fields.name: small_image
fields.description: The relative path to the small image, which is used on catalog pages.

fields.name: special_from_date
fields.description: The beginning date that a product has a special price.

fields.name: special_price
fields.description: The discounted price of the product.

fields.name: special_to_date
fields.description: The end date that a product has a special price.

fields.name: stock_status
fields.description: Stock status of the product

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.description: The relative path to the product's thumbnail image.
